name: Dreams Of Desire Episode 3
description:
You play as the middle sibling of a family living together with Mom, an older and a younger Sister, and a military Father.

As the summer holiday is coming to an end, things are looking grim for our hero, his Dad coming home soon to take him to the military school. Download the Dreams Of Desire [Episode 3] (Lewdlab) [uncen] 2017 in full news.

Our hero, however, has other ideas. He never wanted to be sold. As things start to look inevitable, he stumbles upon an old book.

With the help of newfound knowledge. But how will he do it?
